metadata.title: USN-6547-1 -- Python vulnerability
metadata.description: it was discovered that Python incorrectly handled null bytes when normalizing pathnames. An attacker could possibly use this issue to bypass certain filename checks.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6547-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3.11-doc - 3.11.4-1~23.04.2 python3.11 - 3.11.4-1~23.04.2 idle-python3.11 - 3.11.4-1~23.04.2 libpython3.11-testsuite - 3.11.4-1~23.04.2 libpython3.11-minimal - 3.11.4-1~23.04.2 python3.11-examples - 3.11.4-1~23.04.2 python3.11-venv - 3.11.4-1~23.04.2 libpython3.11 - 3.11.4-1~23.04.2 libpython3.11-stdlib - 3.11.4-1~23.04.2 python3.11-nopie - 3.11.4-1~23.04.2 python3.11-dev - 3.11.4-1~23.04.2 libpython3.11-dev - 3.11.4-1~23.04.2 python3.11-full - 3.11.4-1~23.04.2 python3.11-minimal - 3.11.4-1~23.04.2 No subscription required
